name: Agent S.N.I.P.E.R.
description:
* DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE *

Hello Agent S.N.I.P.E.R.!

Here is the HeadQuarter!

Your mission's simple but not easy, you have to find the target we're looking for and eliminate it. No error allowed! find the right target and come back to the base.

Over and out.
